import ConfigurationContext from '../../context/ConfigurationContext' import './index.css' const Body = () => { const getTheStatus = (showContent, showLeftNavbar, showRightNavbar) =>{ let status if(showContent===true && showLeftNavbar===true && showRightNavbar=== true){ return status = "caseA" }else if(showContent===false && showLeftNavbar===true && showRightNavbar=== true){ return status = "caseB" }else if(showContent===true && showLeftNavbar===false && showRightNavbar=== false){ return status = caseC }else if(showContent===true && showLeftNavbar===true && showRightNavbar=== false){ return status = caseD }else if(showContent===false && showLeftNavbar===false && showRightNavbar=== true){ return status = caseE } console.log(status) return status } return ( {value => { const {showContent, showLeftNavbar, showRightNavbar} = value const status = getTheStatus(showContent, showLeftNavbar, showRightNavbar) console.log(status) return (
